trans-unit.source: Visit the Dropbox Developers App Console and choose your App. On the Apps Settings tab you will find the App key.

With the help of a refresh token, access tokens can be created that allow access to the Dropbox and are roughly valid for one hour. After this time, EXT:dropbox automatically creates a new Access Token.
When you create a Dropbox app, you must decide whether the app has full access or can only access a specific folder. Select here which access type you have chosen.
After you have established access to your Dropbox account and saved it, a brief Dropbox status will appear here.
trans-unit.target: Nachdem Ihr den Zugriff zu Eurem Dropbox Account hergestellt und gespeichert habt, erscheint hier ein kurzer Dropbox Status.
